name: Personalami Style Furry LoRA (Anthro)
description:
Personalami Style LoRA

Disclaimer and Request

Always credit Personalami when posting images generated with this LoRA.

Trained on 100% publicly available images taken from e621.

Please do not sell this LoRA, or images generated with this LoRA (additionally, do not sell access to this LoRA, or access to images generated with this LoRA, e.g. via Patreon or other paid/subscription services).

Please do not remove metadata from images generated with this LoRA.

Model Info

  • Trained on: CoffeeNSFW (My fav. anime model)

  • Epoch: 10

  • Repeats: 4

  • Resolution: 640

  • Images: 213 images from e621

    • I specifically filtered for images with the following tags

      • solo

      • anthro

      • filetype:jpg

      • filetype:png

  • Steps: 8520

  • ClipSkip: 2

Recommendations

  • Trigger Words: None needed

  • Weight: Around 0.9 yielded good results

  • Sampler: DPM++ 2M Karras

  • Base Resolutions: Around 384x576

  • Upscalers:

    • 4x_fatal_Anime_500000_G showed the best results

    • 4x_fooldhardy_Remacri also did OK, but more washed out

  • Extensions:

    • Use Dynamic Thresholding Extension to use high CFGs without burn-in

modelVersions.name: v1
modelVersions.description:
Initial version. Quite happy with this already.

Known Issues

  • Some troubles with extra tails.

  • Occasional extra nipples when up-scaling to high resolutions / with high de-noise.
